name: Long Distance
description:
What is this game about?
Long Distance is a puzzle platformer based on a real long distance relationship.
Together with your friend, family or SO, jump into a pixelated world and discover the challenges to overcome.

Every character has his own few abilties, that can either enter blocked off parts, freeze time or increase your own movement set.
Solve puzzles, unlock the story, and become one with your partner, while also helping these lovebirdies finally getting together.

Created by Tiber and Tiny studios
